badsmell.title: Bad Smell Hunter
badsmell.desc: An intelligent Java tool for detecting and refactoring code smells (duplication, best practice violations), significantly improving maintainability, performance, and software quality in Java projects.

recruitment.title: Recruitment Application
recruitment.desc: A recruitment platform automating candidate management and profile screening. It reduced processing time significantly and optimized the recruiters’ experience.

feedback.title: Feedback Analysis Project
feedback.desc: An innovative web application for employee behavioral analysis using anonymized feedback. It identifies areas for improvement and generates personalized training recommendations, fostering skills development.

covid.title: COVID-19 Dashboard
covid.desc: An interactive dashboard for monitoring COVID-19 epidemiological indicators. The solution integrates multiple data sources and provides clear visualizations, supporting decision-making with a global and up-to-date overview of the pandemic.

children.title: Children Management System
children.desc: A complete digital platform for managing records of over 100 children within an association. It handles personal data registration, daily activity tracking, and role/permission management, improving traceability and operational efficiency.

weather.title: Real-Time Meteorological Monitoring
weather.desc: A web application for real-time monitoring of critical meteorological data (wind direction, humidity, temperature). It enabled production teams to make fast decisions and reduced risks related to atmospheric conditions.

ests.title: Pre-Registration Website – EST Safi
ests.desc: A multilingual website allowing candidates to complete online pre-registration. The solution digitalized the entire process, ensuring accessibility, time efficiency, and a better user experience for both students and administration.

offres.title: Job Market Analytics Dashboard
offres.desc: An interactive dashboard powered by recruitment API data, analyzing job offer trends, contract types, as well as the most in-demand skills, languages, and training, providing strategic insights into the job market.

stock.title: Stock Management System
stock.desc: A robust web application for centralized management of stock, products, categories, and users. It reduces errors from manual entry and enhances team productivity.
